courses.title: Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the basics of music theory. In this course you will learn about notes, scales, and chords.

courses.title: Guitar
courses.description: Learn how to play the guitar. In this course you will learn how to play chords and melodies.

courses.title: Piano
courses.description: Learn how to play the piano. In this course you will learn how to play chords and melodies.

courses.title: Drums
courses.description: Learn how to play the drums. In this course you will learn how to play beats and fills.

courses.title: Singing
courses.description: Learn how to sing. In this course you will learn how to sing in tune and with good technique.
